algorithm

类 PopularityBasedRecommendation

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
      • algorithm.PopularityBasedRecommendation

  • public class PopularityBasedRecommendation
extends UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
    Popularity-based recommendation.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      The maturity threshold.
      (专用程序包) double[] maturityValueArray
      The maturity value array.
      (专用程序包) int maxItemPopularity
      The maximum of item pop.
      private int[] popularItems
      The popular items (for recommend).
      (专用程序包) double[] popularityThresholds
      Item popularity no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.
      private int[] semiPopularItems
      The semi-popular items (for promote).

    • 字段详细资料

      • maturityValueArray

        double[] maturityValueArray
        The maturity value array. For each recommendation to existing rating, the maturity increases by 5. For each recommendation to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.5. For each promotion to existing rating, the maturity increases by 4. For each promotion to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.

      • DEFAULT_MATURITY_THRESHOLD

        public static final double DEFAULT_MATURITY_THRESHOLD
        The default maturity threshold.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • maturityThreshold

        double maturityThreshold
        The maturity threshold.

      • DEFAULT_MATURITY_FOR_EACH_ITEM

        public static final double DEFAULT_MATURITY_FOR_EACH_ITEM
        The default maturity value for each item.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • maxItemPopularity

        int maxItemPopularity
        The maximum of item pop.

      • popularityThresholds

        double[] popularityThresholds
        Item popularity no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.

      • popularItems

        private int[] popularItems
        The popular items (for recommend). It is user related since the current user cannot be considered.

      • semiPopularItems

        private int[] semiPopularItems
        The semi-popular items (for promote). It is user related since the current user cannot be considered.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PopularityBasedRecommendation

        public PopularityBasedRecommendation(RatingSystem2DBoolean paraDataset)
        The second constructor.
        参数:
        paraDataset - The given dataset.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setMaturityValueArray

        public void setMaturityValueArray(double[] paraArray)
        Setter.
        参数:
        paraArray - The maturity value array with four values.

      • setMaturityThreshold

        public void setMaturityThreshold(double paraValue)
        Setter.

      • setPopularityThresholds

        public void setPopularityThresholds(double[] paraThresholds)
        Setter. At the same time, compute popular and semi-popular items.
        参数:
        paraThresholds - Should have exactly two elements.

      • computeMaxItemPopularity

        public int computeMaxItemPopularity()
        Compute the maximum of item pop.

      • recommendForUser

        public void recommendForUser(int paraUser)
        Implement the method in class UserBasedThreeWayRecommender. The recommendation results are stored in currentUserRecommendations and currentUserPromotions.
        指定者:
        recommendForUser 在类中 UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
        参数:
        paraUser - The user index.

      • threeWayRecommend

        public int[][] threeWayRecommend(int paraUser)
        Pop-based recommendation. It changes static variables currentUserRecommendations and currentUserPromotions.
        指定者:
        threeWayRecommend 在类中 UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.
        返回:
        Recommendations/promotions of the current round. It is an integer matrix, where the first row indicates recommended items, while the second indicates promoted ones.
        另请参阅:
        UserBasedThreeWayRecommender.currentUserRecommendations, UserBasedThreeWayRecommender.currentUserPromotions

      • eliminateProcessed

        public static int[] eliminateProcessed(int[] paraArray,
                                       boolean[] paraProcessed)
        Eliminate elements that are already processed.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraProcessed - Indicate which elements have been processed.
        返回:
        The new array.

      • computeUserMaturity

        public double computeUserMaturity(int paraUser)
        Compute the user maturity increment. For each recommendation to existing rating, the maturity increases by 5. For each recommendation to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.5. For each promotion to existing rating, the maturity increases by 4. For each promotion to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.

      • testPopularityBasedRecommendation

        public static void testPopularityBasedRecommendation()
        The main entrance.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main entrance.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
